Paching FrozenDict to have the same repr as a normal dict:

Patching DeviceArray to have less verbose reprs for 0-D arrays:

{% raw %} 
jnp.array(3)

array(3)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
jnp.array([3, 4, 5])
